name: D3GB
author: David Barrios, Carlos Prieto

sections.description:
D3GB produce interactive genome maps and genome browsers with
d3 (d3js.org) from fasta, bed, gff, genbank and vcf files.

To cite D3GB in publications, please use:

Barrios, D. & Prieto, C. D3GB: An Interactive Genome Browser for R,
Python, and WordPress. J. Comput. Biol. (2017).
doi:10.1089/cmb.2016.0213
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/D3GB directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->Genome Browser screen to create D3 Genome Browsers.
sections.changelog:
1.2

  • Fixed unsafe SQL calls.
  • Sanitized and validated POST calls.
  • Checking permissions for some actions.
  • All functions correctly prefixed.
  • Extended readme file.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/D3GB directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->Genome Browser screen to create D3 Genome Browsers.

short_description: A module to produce interactive genome browsers.
